Posts.Content: carlsoj wrote: I have just finished rads and we are taking a short vacation to NC mountains to celebrate...which involves a 1 hr. plane flight (we live at sea level). I had 9 lymph notes removed, and am wondering if I should get a compression sleeve....just in case. I have had no problems to this point.....and would like to keep it that way. What's your advice or experience, ladies ? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: flying soon carlsoj NPat
